snippet.title: CDC Features - Seven Safety Suggestions for Summer Work
snippet.description: * CDC Features - Seven Safety Suggestions for Summer Work * Do not burn plants that may be poison ivy, poison oak, or poison sumac. ... Avoid drinks with caffeine, alcohol, and large amounts of sugar. ... * www.cdc.gov/features/workingoutdoors/
